title: titamon
body: The titan of revenge, Titamon, was born from the hatred of the [[Digimon]] defeated by the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Olympos_XII']Olympos XII[/URL] in battles over the sovereignty of the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digital_World']Digital World[/URL]. It holds the alias of "[B][I]One-Man Division[/I][/B]", and bearing the inexhaustible energy of its hatred within its gigantic body, it runs through the battlefield seeking the heads of the Olympos XII. Its large arms are covered in a multitude of skulls, which are all data of the power it has stolen from the enemies it has defeated so far. As its gigantic [[sword]] "[B][I]Zanjintou[/I][/B]" is a bone sword carved from [[Skullgreymon]]'s bones, the hatred filling the sword makes a low growl. The swing of its Special Move, "[B][I]Konpaku Shingeki[/I][/B]", slides through the opponent's armor and body with its blade, reaching their [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digicore']Digicore[/URL] unhindered and chopping it up. If one takes this technique head on, they'll never be able to recover. Its "[B][I]Genjin Mukon[/I][/B]", which eviscerates the opponent, causes them to fall into a hallucination that they are still being harrowed even after the [B][I]Zanjintou[/I][/B] is pulled out, so that they don't stop suffering until their spirit dies. Its "[B][I]Koou Meigun[/I][/B]" summons shades based on the skulls on both of its arms, which overrun the enemy's forces as an undead legion. This is the reason Titamon is called the "[B][I]One-Man Division[/I][/B]", and it is treated as if it were a legion despite being a single being because it is able to instantly summon a mighty host.

title: noir_firozov
other_names: ノワール・フィロゾフ

title: mamemon
body: A Mutation Digimon that evolved in a harsh environment. Contrary to its cute appearance, it hides terrifying destructive power. Apart from just one other species of [[Digimon]], it may be classed as the strongest. The huge hands on its small body are capable of turning into powerful bombs and detaching themselves. Its nickname is the "[B][I]Smiley Bomber[/I][/B]".

title: metalmamemon
body: A Cyborg Digimon that evolved further in strength than [[Mamemon]], who holds the alias of "[B][I]Smiley Bomber[/I][/B]". As usual, if one is deceived by its cute appearance, they will have a terrible experience. Nine-tenths of its body is mechanized, and its Special Move "[B][I]Energy Bomb[/I][/B]", which is fired from the [B][I]Psycho Blaster[/I][/B] equipped to its left arm, possesses tremendous destructive force which is able to reliably bring down the opponent.

title: hagurumon
body: A mutant Machine Digimon shaped like a gear. There are countless gears built into its body, and the gears are constantly rotating. For that reason, if even a single gear is missing, all of the gears in its body stop rotating, and it becomes unable to maintain its vital functions. Hagurumon possesses the special ability to send a computer virus to its opponents in order to manipulate them at will, and that ability is exploited by fiendish Digimon. However, because Hagurumon itself doesn't have any sense of self, it doesn't even know it is being misused. Its Special Move is burying a black gear with a built-in [URL='https://wikimon.net/Computer_virus']computer virus[/URL] within the body of the opponent, driving them mad ([B][I]Darkness Gear[/I][/B]).

title: atlurkabuterimon_(blue)
body: An evolution of [URL='https://wikimon.net/Kabuterimon']Kabuterimon[/URL] that was discovered within the tropical region of the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Net_Area']Net Area[/URL]. It is almost 1.5 times Kabuterimon's size, and is quite large among Insect Digimon. While its flight abilities have regressed to a certain extent, the strength of its horn, which is its main weapon, has soared. Also, muscular tissues have appeared on the base of its forelimbs, so its grappling ability has also improved. Its behavior, with the exception of its survival instincts, has been observed to consist of protecting the weak, and there are even times when its behavior has appeared knight-like. Its Special Move is stabbing the opponent with its gigantic horn ([B][I]Horn Buster[/I][/B]).
other_names: アトラーカブテリモン(青)

title: atlurkabuterimon
body: An evolution of [URL='https://wikimon.net/Kabuterimon']Kabuterimon[/URL] that was discovered within the tropical region of the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Net_Area']Net Area[/URL]. It is almost 1.5 times Kabuterimon's size, and is quite large among Insect Digimon. It is the same species as the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Atlur_Kabuterimon_(Blue)']blue Atlur Kabuterimon[/URL], and similarly, the strength of its horn, which is its main weapon, has soared, but this type of Atlur Kabuterimon seems to have surpassed it in flight ability. Also, muscular tissues have appeared on the base of its forelimbs, so its grappling ability has also improved. Its behavior, with the exception of its survival instincts, has been observed to consist of protecting the weak, and there are even times when its behavior has appeared knight-like. Its Special Move is stabbing the opponent with its gigantic horn ([B][I]Horn Buster[/I][/B]).
other_names: アトラーカブテリモン

title: chaosmon_valdur_arm
body: Normally, when a [URL='https://wikimon.net/Jogress']Jogress[/URL] occurs, the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digicore']Digicores[/URL] of the two fellow Digimon are completely fused and are reborn as a new Digimon, but Chaosmon retains each of the Digicores of the Digimon before the Jogress, and maintains its form in a very incomplete state. Chaosmon is the codename for Digimon who "should not exist", and according to the "[URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central_Dogma']Central Dogma[/URL]" of the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digital_World']Digital World[/URL], are absolute impossible singularities ([URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/software_bug']bugs[/URL]). Due to its extremely unstable existence, its lifespan is very brief, and it is conjectured that its lifespan was shortened as a result of running the program that eliminates the bugs released by the Digital World's [URL='https://wikimon.net/Yggdrasill']managing system[/URL]. This Chaosmon is believed to be one that was Jogressed from [URL='https://wikimon.net/Bancho_Leomon']Bancho Leomon[/URL] and [URL='https://wikimon.net/Valdurmon']Valdurmon[/URL], and the faces of each Digimon are visible on its arms. Its Special Moves are an invincible decisive stroke unleashed from the "[B][I]BAN-TYO Blade[/I][/B]" equipped to its "[B][I]Bancho Arm[/I][/B]" ([B][I]Haou Ryoudanken[/I][/B]), and a purifying shot of light fired from its "[B][I]Valdur Arm[/I][/B]" ([B][I]Aurora Blaster[/I][/B]).
other_names: カオスモン:ヴァロドゥルアーム

body:

title: okuwamon
body: As an evolution of [URL='https://wikimon.net/Kuwagamon']Kuwagamon[/URL], it evolved more balefully than [URL='https://wikimon.net/Kabuterimon-species']Kabuterimon-species[/URL] Digimon. It was enhanced with a particular focus on Kuwagamon's inferior defensive side. As for its offensive side, the reconnaissance ability of its antennae was improved, and the attack accuracy of its scissors was increased. In addition, it has been proven that it possesses not only its survival instinct but also its destructive impulses as its primary traits. It can be said that it is a more aggressive evolved form. Its Special Move is an enhanced version of "[B][I]Scissor Arms[/I][/B]" that can clip through even a diamond with a [URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohs_scale_of_mineral_hardness']hardness of 10[/URL] ([B][I]Scissor Arms Ω[/I][/B]).

title: amphimon
body:
A Cyborg Digimon that wanders about everywhere in the vast "[URL='https://wikimon.net/Net_Ocean']Net Ocean[/URL]", forging connections with various marine Digimon. It is capable of diving into ultra-high pressure zones thanks to the [B][I]Bodysuit[/I][/B] that covers its whole body, and has even intruded the "Abyss Sanctuary", which is constructed at the extreme depths of the sea. Like Angel Digimon and God Man Digimon, it is permitted to pass judgment upon those judged to be evil in the Net Ocean. Once a battle begins, its usual merriment undergoes a complete about-face like the raging sea, and it strikes sinners with a blow of judgment.

Its Special Moves are shooting cold air from its fist to freeze the opponent ([B][I]Crystal Freezer[/I][/B]), sending off ultra-high pressure water cutters from its horizontally swung hand ([B][I]Aqua[/I][/B] [B][I][URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zanbatō']Zanba[/URL][/I][/B]), and delivering a kick with its electrified foot ([B][I]Raiburn Break[/I][/B]). Also, it can deploy several [B][I]Jellyfish Units[/I][/B] to form its "[B][I]Umbre Defender[/I][/B]" electromagnetic shield to protect itself or its companions.

title: rasielmon
body:
An Ophan Digimon that was once appointed to the same rank as [URL='https://wikimon.net/Ofanimon']Ofanimon[/URL]. It possesses the mysterious power to foresee everything in the world from the "[URL='https://wikimon.net/Kernel']Kernel[/URL]" ([URL='https://wikimon.net/God']God[/URL]'s domain). It is said that it knows all about events throughout the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digital_World']Digital World[/URL], and has gained a divine amount of knowledge with that power.

Its Special Moves are freely combining the [URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Five_elements_(Japanese_philosophy)']five elements[/URL] from the [URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/magic_circle']magic circles[/URL] on its arms and releasing enormous energy ([B][I]Knowledge Stream[/I][/B]). And, as for its "[B][I][URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sefer_Raziel_HaMalakh']Sefer Raziel[/URL][/I][/B]", which brings about all kinds of miracles to exterminate the adversary, not even Rasielmon itself knows what will happen.

title: nyabootmon
body:
A Puppet Digimon whose cape flutters as it wanders gallantly across the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digital_World']Digital World[/URL]. While it is dressed in attire similar to a medieval knight, its appearance is the epitome of a cat walking on two legs. Although it does not come across as very dignified due to its pompous way of speaking and overdramatic actions, it is actually brimming with a passionate sense of justice, and has a starkly contrasting personality that never condones wrongdoing.

Using its gravity-manipulating platform boots, it travels throughout the Digital World as if it is flying about, and goes around resolving problems using its cherished sword, the "[B][I]Nekojara Sword[/I][/B]".

Its combat strength is high despite having a short build. It makes sport of the enemy with its nimble movements and peculiar sword techniques that trace out mysterious paths. The way it skillfully defeats its enemies makes it truly heroic, and there are many Digimon who look up to Nyabootmon.

Its Special Moves are utilizing its gravity manipulation to jump up high, and then delivering an intense kick as it rapidly descends ([B][I]Graviton Neko Kick[/I][/B]), unleashing a high-speed sword technique where it dives at the opponent's chest in one leap ([B][I][URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marquis_de_Carabas']Carabas[/URL][/I][/B] [B][I]Special[/I][/B]), and bewitching the opponent with its elegant sword and body movements, and dishing out nine slashes in an instant ([B][I]Hiken: Cat the Nine Lives[/I][/B]).

title: superman_(2025)
body: A 2025 [[Superman (Series)|]] movie directed by James Gunn. It is the first live action movie of the new soft reboot [[DC Universe (franchise)|DC Universe]] (DCU) after the [[DC Extended Universe]] ended in 2023.
other_names: スーパーマン(2025年の映画)

title: hudiemon
body:
A humanoid Insect Digimon with the wings of a butterfly. It is cautious at first, but once it gets to know someone, it will reveal its cheerful, innocent countenance. It travels all over the [URL='https://wikimon.net/Digital_World']Digital World[/URL] while dancing gracefully in well-lit places. It is said to be like a backup of the Digital World, accessing records throughout the world and storing vast amounts of record data within itself. Even if a strange phenomenon occurs in the Digital World and records and memories are lost, the lost data will be restored if Hudiemon is around.

Its Special Moves are soaring into the air and dishing out a flying kick ([B][I]Flying Kick[/I][/B]), and flapping its wings to stir up a gust that spreads its [URL='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scale_(insect_anatomy)']scales[/URL] ([B][I]Infinity Dream[/I][/B]). While it is capable of poisoning or paralyzing the enemy when using "[B][I]Infinity Dream[/I][/B]" on them, its main function is to ease the pain of its wounded allies and make them feel better.

title: uss_enterprise_(cv-6)
body:
The second of the [i]Yorktown[/i]-class [[aircraft carrier]]s for the [[United States Navy]], that earned great renown for its actions in [[World War II]]. She was nicknamed "Big E", "Lucky E", "The Grey Ghost", and "The Galloping Ghost".

She fought in almost all of the battles in the Pacific Campaign and was considered a lucky ship due to surviving major damages and hardships. The [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] mistakenly believed they had sunk her on multiple occasions, only to encounter her again in later battles. Having earned twenty battle stars and numerous other awards, Enterprise was the most decorated U.S. ship of WWII, though contrary to popular belief is not the most decorated U.S. ship of all time. 

After the war, several attempts were made to raise enough money to buy her from the US Navy and preserve her as a museum ship, but they all failed to reach the amount of money to do so. She was scheduled for scrapping on July 1, 1958 and was completely scrapped on May 1960.

This tag is for depictions of the actual vessel, and for personifications outside of established franchises. 

h4. [i]Yorktown[/i]-class aircraft carriers

* [[USS Yorktown (CV-5)]] 
* [b]USS Enterprise (CV-6)[/b]

body:

The names Yua and Mia are a pun based on the English words “you” and “me”.

h4. Appearance

Identical to Yua, she had [[brown eyes]] and [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] ([[blonde hair|light]]) [[brown hair]].

title: luo_xiaohei
body:
The titular character from [[luo xiaohei zhanji|The Legend of Luo Xiao Hei]].

His [[luo_xiaohei_(human)|human]] form has [[green eyes]], [[cat ears]], and [[short hair]] that is either [[white hair|white]] or [[black hair|black]].

His [[luo_xiaohei_(cat)|animal form]] takes on the appearance of a [[black cat]] with [[black eyes]].

The miniature [[creature]]s sometimes seen around him - resembling disembodied cat heads - are called  [[Heixiu]]. They are made by Xiaohei himself, as he possesses the ability to break off pieces of his own tail into autonomous creatures.

Xiaohei is voiced by Xin Shan in Chinese, [[Hanazawa Kana]] in Japanese, and Emi Lo in English.

title: moonlight_greatsword
body:
Recurring legendary weapon in [[FromSoftware]] games, first appearing in [[King's Field]] as Holy Moonlight Sword. It is a [[greatsword]] that [[glowing weapon|glows]] with otherworldly green (sometimes blue) light, and can launch projectiles when swung.

* [[Armored Core]] has one in every series, starting from "[[moonlight (armored core)|LS-99-MOONLIGHT]]".
* [[Demon's Souls]] has the "Large Sword of Moonlight".
* [[Dark Souls (series)|]] has the "Moonlight Greatsword", associated with [[Seath the Scaleless]].
** A replica called the "Bluemoon Greatsword" also exists in [[Dark Souls II|II]].
* [[Bloodborne]] has "Holy Moonlight Sword", wielded by [[Ludwig the Accursed]]. There is also a replica, "[[Ludwig's Holy Blade]]".
* [[Elden Ring]] has the "Dark Moon Greatsword", bestowed by [[Ranni the Witch]] at the end of her questline.

title: ria_(isekai_nonbiri_nouka)
body: The leader of a group of high-[[elf]] girls. Their village was destroyed by humans in a war 200 years ago, and they've been wandering homeless ever since until Tia brought them to Hiraku's farm. They contribute to the farm by establishing a smithy to make metal tools and [[weapon|weapons]], and bringing other technologies such as building construction and baking.
other_names: リア(異世界のんびり農家)

title: tia_(isekai_nonbiri_nouka)
body: A female [[angel]] and frenemy of [[rurushi_ru|Ru]]. She births Hiraku's first daughter, who is an angel like her mother; angels are a mono-sexed race. She also brought with her the farm's first chickens, as well as the infamous Three Killer Angels and some Lizardmen.
other_names: ティア(異世界のんびり農家)

title: alfred_(isekai_nonbiri_nouka)
body: A character from [[Isekai Nonbiri Nouka]].

title: francis_xavier
body: St. Francis Xavier was a Spanish Jesuit who lived as a Roman Catholic missionary in the 1500s. He was one of the first seven members of the Jesuit order and traveled extensively, particularly in India, Southeast Asia, and Japan, to share his faith. He is the patron saint of Roman Catholic missions.

title: rurushi_ru
body: A magic-using female [[vampire]] from [[Isekai Nonbiri Nouka]] who has an interest in growing medicinal plants. Her size changes with the loss and intake of blood. [spoiler]She is Hiraku's first wife and the mother of their son Alfred[/spoiler].

title: flora_(isekai_nonbiri_nouka)
body: [[rurushi ru|Ru]]'s sister from [[Isekai Nonbiri Nouka]]. Also a researcher, her interest in the fermentation process made her move to the village. She also brought to the farm its first two heads of cattle.

title: machio_hiraku
body: The main protagonist of [[Isekai Nonbiri Nouka]]. While starting out on his own, Hiraku ends up befriending wolves and the spider monster Zabuton; even accepting humanoid species into his settlement. To some of his confusion, Hiraku ends up with [spoiler]a harem with at least seven wives and children; though some of the elves have children with him solely for continuing their bloodline[/spoiler].

title: tag_group:colors
body:

h4#single-color-themes. Single color themes

Used for content featuring a specific dominant color.

* 1. Includes [[monochrome]] images of that color
** Does not include the colors black, white, or grey, which only use the [[greyscale]] tag
* 2. Images where a large number of items in the image are that color
** Example: when the subject is dressed primarily or entirely in clothes of that color.

* [[aqua theme]]

title: shipping_container
body:
A shipping container (or intermodal container) is a large standardized container for shipping. Other than [[container ship]]s, it could be used across different modes of transport (from [[ship]] to [[train|rail]] to [[truck]]). They are primarily used to store and transport materials and products efficiently and securely worldwide.


h4.External links:
* "Wikipedia: Shipping container":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intermodal_container

title: ladder_lottery
body:
A type of lottery used to randomly pair items.

The lottery consists of a ladder of vertical lines connected by horizontal lines. The player chooses a line on top and follows the line down, following horizontal lines whenever they're encountered, until they reach a prize at the bottom.

Also known as Ghost Leg in Chinese and Amidakuji in Japanese.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Ghost leg":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost_leg]

Batman is a 1989 superhero film based on the [[DC Comics]] [[Batman|character]] of the same name.
Directed by Tim Burton, it is the first installment of Warner Bros.' initial Batman film series. The film was produced by Jon Peters and Peter Guber and stars [[Jack Nicholson]], [[Michael Keaton]], Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl, Pat Hingle, Billy Dee Williams, Michael Gough and Jack Palance. Followed by [[Batman Returns]].

title: batman_and_robin_(1997)
body:
Batman & Robin is a 1997 American superhero film based on the [[DC Comics]] characters [[Batman]] and [[Robin (dc)|Robin]] by Bill Finger and Bob Kane. It is the fourth and final installment of Warner Bros.' initial Batman film series, a sequel to [[Batman Forever]] (1995), and the only film in the series made without the involvement of Tim Burton in any capacity. Directed by Joel Schumacher and written by Akiva Goldsman, it stars George Clooney as [[Bruce Wayne]] / Batman (replacing Val Kilmer) and Chris O'Donnell as Dick Grayson / Robin, alongside [[Arnold Schwarzenegger]], Uma Thurman, and Alicia Silverstone. The film follows the eponymous characters as they attempt to prevent Mr. Freeze (Schwarzenegger) and Poison Ivy (Thurman) from taking over the world, while at the same time struggling to keep their partnership together.

h4. External links

* "IMDb: Batman & Robin":https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118688/
* "Wikipedia: Batman & Robin (film)":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batman_%26_Robin_(film)

title: ghostbusters
body:
[b]Ghostbusters[/b] is a 1984 American supernatural comedy film directed and produced by "Ivan Reitman":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivan_Reitman and written by "Dan Aykroyd":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dan_Aykroyd and [[Harold Ramis]].

The film stars [[Bill Murray]], Aykroyd, and Ramis as three eccentric parapsychologists who start a ghost-catching business in New York City. [[Sigourney Weaver]] and "Rick Moranis":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rick_Moranis co-star as a client and her neighbor, and "Ernie Hudson":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernie_Hudson as the Ghostbusters' first recruit.

Aykroyd conceived the film as a project for himself and fellow [[Saturday Night Live]] alumnus "John Belushi":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Belushi , with the "Ghostmashers" travelling through time and space. He and Ramis dramatically rewrote the script following Belushi's death and after Reitman deemed Aykroyd's initial vision financially impractical.

Ghostbusters was released in the United States on June 8, 1984. It was a critical and commercial success, receiving a positive response from critics and audiences and grossing US$242 million in the United States and more than $295 million worldwide. It was nominated for two Oscars at the 57th Academy Awards for Best Visual Effects and Best Original Song (for the eponymous theme song), but lost to Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom and The Woman in Red respectively. 

The film launched the Ghostbusters media franchise, which includes a 1989 sequel, [[Ghostbusters II]]; two animated television series, [[The Real Ghostbusters]] and [[Extreme Ghostbusters]] as well as several video games. 

A [[Ghostbusters (2016)|reboot]] starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, and Leslie Jones was released in July 2016 but received negative reviews and was a box office bomb.

An official sequel to the original films titled Ghostbusters: Afterlife was released on November 19, 2021. A fourth film, Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire, was released on March 22, 2024.

h4. Characters

* [[Peter Venkman]]
* [[Raymond Stantz]]
* [[Egon Spengler]]

* [[Stay Puft]]

title: space_ishtar_(second_ascension)_(fate)
body:
[[Space Ishtar (fate)|]]'s second ascension from [[Fate/Grand Order]], nicknamed [b]Ishtarin[/b] by [[Calamity Jane (fate)|]]. She wears a yellow vest, a blue bandeau, yellow fingerless gloves, yellow shorts, a bandage on her left knee, and yellow knee boots. Her eyes are colored red in this form.

In the Saber Wars II event, she allies herself with the player character, trying to help them find a way back to their own universe after they escaped from Astarte. She is one of the fragments of the primordial goddess [[Space Ishtar (Astarte Origin) (fate)|Astarte Origin]] who was raised by [[Tohsaka Tokiomi|Professor Tokiomi]] and became a bounty hunter working alongside [[Calamity Jane (fate)|]] after his death. [spoiler]While initially assumed to be goddess' good half, it is revealed she is actually the evil half.[/spoiler]

title: xuange_(gujian_qitan)
body: The twin brother of [[Bei Luo (Gujian Qitan)|]], the protagonist of [[Gujian Qitan 3]], was forced to separate when they were babies. At the beginning of the game, he was seriously injured and dying. He wanted to find Bei Luo to inherit the throne of the evil spirit king.
